title: Saucer, 1813
dimensions: H x diam.: 2.5 x 14 cm (1 in. x 5 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of Katrina H. Becker in memory of her parents, Mr. and Mrs. Charles V. Hickox
description: Circular form with alternating large roundels of fruit on faux malechite background.  Smaller roundels of butterflies on lapis background.  Center contains a shell on a marbelized background surrounded by a coffered pattern.

tombstone.epitaph:
Saucer, 1813.
1813. Porcelain, enamel, gold. Gift of Katrina H. Becker in memory of her parents, Mr. and Mrs. Charles V. Hickox. 1981-38-7.
